docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Test-5 listening import IPython;IPython.display.Audio(filename="1.mp3") I'd like to find out if you have any excursions suitable for families. excursion [ɪk'skɜːʃ(ə)n] 远足 suitable 这种后置修饰要注意别漏听 reading Cork - the thick bark of the cork oal tree (Quercus suber) - is a remarkable material. Cork 软木。出现学名不懂也没办法 thick [θɪk] 厚的 bark [bɑːk] 树皮，毛皮 cork oal tree 软木橡树 remarkable [rɪ'mɑːkəb(ə)l] 卓越的，值得注意的。remark(评论) mark(标记) It is tough , elastic , buoyant , and fire-resistant , and suitable for a wide range of purposes. tough [tʌf] 坚韧的 elastic [ɪ'læstɪk] adj.有弹性的 n.橡皮圈 buoyant [ˈbɔɪənt] 轻快的 fire-resistant ['faɪə] [rɪ'zɪstənt] 抗火的 It has also been used for millennia : the ancient Egyptians sealed their sarcophagy (stone coffins ) with cork, while the ancient Greeks and Romans used it for anything from beenhives to sandals . millennia [mɪˈleniə] 一千年 Egyptians [i:'dʒipʃənz] 埃及人 Greeks 希腊人 Romans 罗马人 seal [siːld] 封闭 coffins 棺材 beehive ['biːhaɪv] 蜂房 sandals ['sændlz] 凉鞋 And the cork oak itself is an extraordinary tree. extraordinary [ɪkˈstrɔːdənrɪ] 非凡的 Its bark grows up to 20 cm in thickness, insulating the tree like a coat wrapped around the trunk and branches and keeping the inside at a constant 20 ℃ all year round. insulate ['ɪnsjʊleɪt] 使绝缘 illustrate(说明) trunk 树干 Developed most probably as a defence against forest fires, the bar of the cork oak has a particular cellular structure - with about 40 million cells per cubic centimetre - that technology has never succeeded in replicating . 过去分词引导的句子做状语 most probably 很可能地 forest 森林 bar 棒，障碍 cellular 细胞的 centimetre ['sentɪmiːtə] 公分，厘米 (下下句里)millimetre ['mili,mi:tə] 毫米 replicate 复制 It also has an elasticity that means you can squash it and watch it spring back to its original size and shape when you release the pressure. squash 挤压 spring back 生长(spring有跳起、裂开的意思n/vi.vt) They flourish in warm, sunny climates where there is a minimum of 400 millimetres of rain per year. flourish ['flʌrɪʃ] 兴旺 climate [ˈklaɪmɪt] 气候 a minimum of 400 millimetres of rain Like grape vines , the trees thrive in poor soil , putting down deep roots in search of moisture and nutrients . grape vine 葡萄 藤 thrive [θraɪv] 兴旺，茁壮成长 (flourish) soil 土壤 moisture ['mɒɪstʃə] 水分 nutrient ['njuːtrɪənt] n.营养物，adj.营养的。nutritious有营养的，nutrition营养，营养学 in search of Today accounts for roughly half of all cork production around the world. ... are around 200 years old accounts for xx of xx 占比 around adv.大约，到处，在附近，prep.在周围 an exercise in patience 对耐心的锻炼 From the planting of a cork sapling to the first harvest takes 25 years, and a gap of approximately a decade must separate harvests from an individual tree. sapling ['sæplɪŋ] 树苗 harvest ['hɑːvɪst] 收获 separate (使)分开 If the bark is stripped on a day when it's too cold - or when the air is damp - the tree will be damaged. strip 脱去 damp 潮湿的 Cork harvesting is a very specialised profession . No mechanical means of stripping cork bark has been invented. specialised profession 特别的职业 mechanical means 机械手段 invent 发明 They make vertical cuts down the bark using small sharp axes , then lever it away in pieces as large as they can manage. vertical 垂直的 sharp axes 尖锐的斧头 lever 杠杆撬动 The most skilful cork-strippers prise away a semi-circular husk that runs the lenght of the trunk from just above ground level to the first branches. It is then dried on the ground. prise 撬动 (lever) semi-circular 半圆形的 husk [hʌsk] 皮，外壳 (bark) ground 地面 dry 使边干 It is boiled to kill any insects that ight remain in the cork. boil 煮沸 insect ['ɪnsekt] 昆虫 Over 60% of cork then goes on to be made into traditional bottle stoppers , with most of the remainder being used in the construction trade. go on 继续 bottle stoppers 瓶塞 construction 建设 Corkboard and cork tiles are ideal for thermal and acoustic insulation, while granules of cork are used in the manufacture of concrete. tile 瓷砖 ideal 理想的 thermal ['θɜːm(ə)l] 热量的 acoustic [ə'kuːstɪk] 声学的 granules [grænju:ls] 颗粒 manufacture [mænjʊ'fæktʃə] 加工，制造 Recent years have seen the end of the virtual monopoly of cork as the material for bottle stoppers, due to concerns about the effect it may have on the contents of the bottle. This is caused by a chemical compound call 2,4,6-trichloroanisole (TCA), which forms through the interaction of plant phenols, chlorine and mould. virtual [ˈvɜ:tʃuəl] 虚拟的，实质上的（但未正式被承认） monopoly [mə'nɒp(ə)lɪ] 垄断 chemical compound ['kemɪk(ə)l]['kɒmpaʊnd] 化合物 interaction 互动 phenols, chlorine 酚，氯 mould 霉 The tiniest concentrations - as little as three or four parts to a trillion - can spoil the taste of the product contained in the botltle. tiniest 最 微小的(tiny) concentration 关注点 spoil 糟蹋，破坏，溺爱 The result has been a gradual yet steady move first towards plastic stoppers and, more recently, to aluminium screw caps. These substitutes are cheaper. gradual 逐渐的, graduate 毕业(的) yet 还，但是 steady 稳定 stable plastic 塑料(的) aluminium 铝的 screw n.螺旋，v.拧 cap 帽，盖 substitute 替代品 alternative n.替代的选择adj.交替的选择性的 alternation n.交替 classic 经典的 同classical，前者还有著作，后者有古典音乐之意 *Its traditional image is more in keeping with that of the type of high quality goods with which it has long been associated. traditional image 传统形象 in keeping with 符合 sustainable 可持续发展的 sustain 维持 biodiversity [,baɪə(ʊ)daɪ'vɜːsɪtɪ] 生物多样性 desertification 沙漠化 The future of this ancient material once again looks promising . promising 有希望的
docs.title: C12

docs.text: import IPython;IPython.display.Audio(filename="1.mp3") I'd like to find out if you have any excursions suitable for families. excursion [ɪk'skɜːʃ(ə)n] 远足 suitable 这种后置修饰要注意别漏听
